name: Erika Hill
text: Best pizza ever.  For less than $10, you can get an 11-inch, personal-sized, thin crust pizza with ANYTHING you want (called a "build-your-own").  Any sauce, any cheeses, any toppings.  My go-to is spicy red sauce, shredded mozzarella, …More

name: Rich Sangprom
text: Lots of options to build your own pizza. Definitely recommend the dough knots. The pizza crust is crispy, airy, but not overly crunchy. The spicy marinara is actually pretty spicy. Ordering was simple. Overall great experience.

name: Ramzi Sahouri
text: Blaze Pizza is my GO-TO spot!! Everytime I enter this location I am great with a nice big smile and feel welcomed everytime. Manager Chris always ensures that my food is top notch and answers any of my pizza related questions haha. Jaden is …More

name: Derek Kostiha
text: Good pizza. Salad was small or overpriced. Great app and practices to prevent the spread of covid.

name: Silvia I
text: Keto, cauliflower, & gluten free crust options with all "build your own pizza" toppings (a visit during Covid-19)

name: Jonathan Morris
text: Similar to MOD and other build your own brick oven pizza spots, Blaze has the best selection of quality ingredients. Consistently, I am disappointed with other chains. Blaze has not dropped the ball once, even in these crazy times. …More

name: Michael Longoria
text: I've always heard good things about this place. The online order process was simple and pizza was made quickly as promised, however, my pizzas barely had cheese and the sauce was very sweet. I personally couldn't finish mine and I probably won't be back. Just not my style.

name: Jose Yuseaf
text: Very bright and lively employees and great pizza crust. Sauce is good, but not great. The other toppings though are fresh AF!

name: Zane Winberg
text: That's probably the best eat out pizza I've ever had. Great service too! Thanks Blaze Pizza!

name: Michael Deckers
text: Very simple pizza. Simple dough that is light and crispy. Simple sauce is fresh. Really good fresh pizza

name: Shibani Gupta
text: I am very happy with the perfectly made pizza customized as per my order at a very reasonable price.

name: Matt Jenkins
text: The best and create your own pizza. Gluten free and vegan cheese pizza options.

name: Chris James
text: Yum! First time having Blaze but it won’t be the last. Absolutely delicious and so much variety!

name: Terry Davidson
text: Pretty good pizza, a lot of options for sauces and toppings. All I have had have tasted good. Would give it 5 stars except I prefer my pizza to have a thicker crust. Their thing is your pizza is fired at a very high temperature so I'm sure a thinner crust works better for them. It's not bad it's just that I like a thicker chewy crust.

name: Kevin Osborn
text: What an unexpected delight!  Blaze pizza was not only delicious but has a wonderful selection of all natural ingredients and alternative crust options. The staff was super friendly and helpful and the pizza cooked quickly. Loved it!

name: Manoj Hirwani
text: I love this pizza corner. Today I am having this "Green Stripe" pizza with small additions of white sauce , turkey meatballs and sea salt.. this is the best ever pizza I had in my entire life.. I recommend any one to come here and at least …More

name: Zachary Fulp
text: Blaze makes me so happy. I love going to this location after work. The staff is always friendly and I’m a huge fan of their vegan options. That have soyrizzo and Daiya cheese!

name: Bibiano Lopez
text: $10.95 Large Pepperoni Pizza Special. Fresh and tasty.

name: Eli Amaya
text: I’ve been coming here for a long time. Really fast service and the pizza is good. Recommend doing an all meats with pineapple and cherry tomatoes pizza. Store cleanliness was good. The kids that work there are nice and polite.

name: sundar M
text: This place serve "make your own" pizza. There is lot of options for the toppings. We can add any number of toppings. After the toppings, pizza is baked in front of us in the owner and served to us. This is one of our favorite pizza place. We love the variety of  toppings. Taste great. Would highly recommend this place

name: dot lu
text: Flat bread wood oven pizza was delicious. The red spicy Mariners sauce is delicious.

name: Adriano Gonella
text: Great place, pretty good environment. Dough is soft and crisp at same time, they put additional oil on back when baking. It is really nice to be able to customize the pizza with many options, by the way you can ask to put as you wish, UNLIMITED. Try white stripes, no sauce.

name: James Banks
text: The pizza was okay and I would describe it as a Mod-style affair. They just don't make it with Mod-style appeal. Too much sauce and not enough crisp in the crust. No real complaints and I would try it again but if a Mod were across the street I would happily look both ways and head over there.

name: Josh Mazingo
text: The food is good but the service is trash. Been in lobby for 15min, and haven't been acknowledged.  Had to yell that I was there for my order to get employees attention.

name: Noah Wittenberg
text: Every since the first time I tried Blaze Pizza, in San Diego about 5 years ago, I've been singing it's praise. This location is as good as it gets when it comes to making a quality custom pizza. If you want every option you can imagine top wise, or just a simple pie done right, come to Blaze. It's fire

name: shravani R
text: Love that it's quick and you can customize your pizza. Plenty of toppings to choose from, all at one price. I ended up customizing a signature pizza - Green Stripe. Perfectly done and turned out amazing. I had to tell the guy to add more sauce,  he didn't  put enough sauce on my pizza.

name: T
text: Build your own pizza!! Delish! My hubby ate it all in one sitting it was so good!

name: Lindsey Seedall
text: Love the non-dairy options! Food is excellent and always fresh! Highly recommend. The toppings are all yummy and the balsamic drizzle is a must!

name: T Robinson
text: Great pizza!!  A little pricey but it’s worth it.  Awesome atmosphere, If your looking for fresh ingredients this is the way too go!

name: Jay Bee
text: Amazing! Unlimited toppings and keto crust. High cal but worth sharing or saving for later. Keto crust is actually really good made from mozzarella, flax, and egg. Highly recommend to fitness buffs.

name: Abe Alhabarneh
text: I love this place and will always go there for pizza

name: Waseem Qazi
text: Best pizza in cedar park! O the mounds of toppings u can add for just under $8. Perfect for ppl on a budget. Super tasty, fresh,  nutritious n amazing experience every time I visit. Great drinks selection as well. And I live in south Austin! Once quarantine is over, this’ll b the first places I hit up.

name: Kevin Madison
text: Great Pizza at unbelievably low prices.

name: Michael Hill
text: I was in the mood to craft my own pizza and was very happy I came here.  I chose between the cauliflower crust and keto crust.  Thanks Blaze for having the ingredients handy to review.  The cauli crust was delicious.  I had mine loaded with …More

name: Super Dave
text: Great pizza!  They can make Pink Sauce also which isn't on the menu.  Its only $1.65 more for unlimited toppings vs the basic 1 topping which is a great deal.  Recommend asking to pull pizza out early to avoid slightly burned edges.  Excellent natural sugar sodas and Blood Orange Lemonade.

name: Michel Farhi-Chevillard
text: Quick delicious and cheap pizza.

name: Dasha D
text: it was the worst pizza i had to try. There were so many toppings that the pizza was wet and by the way it was not hot, barely warm.  The whole filling was as if boiled. I had to put it in the oven at home and try to cook it, but she did not become better.  I do not advise anyone

name: Erica Crawford
text: Definitely recommend. My husband and I eat here a lot. It's a great option for fast, healthier, food that tastes good and comes at a great price - we make it healthy by loading up on veggies and there are many options to choose from. One …More

name: David N.
text: Very good pizza restaurant. You can build your own pizzas with a large variety of sauces, meats, cheese and vegetables. They cook them fast and the pizza is ready in aboyt 5 minutes. Very friendly and attentive staff. The restaurant was clean with plenty of seating.

name: Saltine
text: Blaze Pizza is an amazing restaurant. I often eat there during my lunch breaks and they take great care in being very friendly and careful in making their pizzas. They always make me feel very welcome whenever I come and even remember my …More

name: Maksym Iakobchuk
text: Ordered here first and last time. Moist piece of something. Baked it additionally at home.

name: Ashley Eymard
text: Used to like coming here. Today one of the employees told me there would be a charge for one of their finishes. What? I’ve never been charged before. And I thought that was part of the build your own? Nah, I’m good. Then I get home and …More

name: Jonathan Paredes
text: I love Blaze Pizza! The restaurant is family friendly and warm atmosphere. The dinning room is always clean and the staff is really nice! I don’t ever really run into long lines - maybe 5 people at most - but it goes by super fast. The food …More

name: Marissa Gonzalez
text: They gave us the wrong crust but when we told them, they didn't fix it, had an excuse and sent us on our way. We were really disappointed and did not like the crust at all. We usually love this pizza.

name: Amber Rees
text: Looooove this place! Keto crust pizza. Enough said!

name: Tobias Funsue
text: Nice people and great food.

name: Gobinathan G
text: Yummy ,delicious Pizza . You can make your own Pizza at the store . You can add as many toppings as you want. The Pizza is think , crispy , yummy. Many options for vegetarians . The pizza is priced reasonably. The wait time is just 5-10 min.

name: James Hall
text: Good pizza real fast. I would have give 5 stars if they would have put drinks in a less crowded spot. Many people blocking bathroom path for drinks and vice versa.

name: Robert Cochran
text: I've never been here before but I was really impressed. My pizza was simple but tasted really good and I would absolutely have it again. Also they helped me order because I was new and I really appreciated it.

name: Warren Gillies
text: Let's you put as many toppings as you want. It'll be as good as you make it.

name: Brandon Portie
text: Awesome place... great tasting fresh pizza made while you wait

name: Edwin Waller
text: Good pizza and fast. Best if all DINE IN!!!

name: Ev Ma
text: So we wanted wood fired pizza and found this place. The pizza there is delicious. The fact that we were able to customize for a low price was even better. We had 2 minor issues. Garlic knots not cooked though and no lime or salt for the dos equis.

name: Amy Ma
text: Cool idea to make your own personal pizza, quick place to grab a bite. Perfect thin and crispy crust. Unfortunately, they aren't consistent in topping distribution! Otherwise decent, the staff here are super friendly

name: Jadyn Cunningham
text: Love this place! You can do one of their specialties with the option to customize too! Fire cooked to perfection. Oh and their Agua Fresca is so good! I haven’t been their more than once where there wasn’t a new flavor. Staff has always been friendly and gets the job done.

name: kaleb bailey
text: This place is awesome. Great customer service. Great food. Great atmosphere. Highly recommended

name: Eduardo Salas
text: Fast, friendly service. Employees were all on top of the game, flowing and helping each other out. Manager flashed in and out on the line. Dining room was kept up. Good experience.

name: Caleb Campbell
text: Been coming here for years. Delicious fully customized pizza, excellent hospitality, and nice dining environment. A really great value!

name: namratha Peddisetty
text: The taste and the availability of gluten free and vegan pizzas

name: Jennifer Painter
text: O. M. G. Why did I not listen to Keli? This is sooo good and the price is even better.  Red Vine and Meat Eater shown. Buffalo chicken salad is not shown because it was inhaled. See y'all tomorrow.

name: VJ
text: Had build your own chicken pizza.. hot and fresh.. enjoyed it.

name: Jennifer Ferguson
text: I really wanted to love this place for their keto pizza. It was really tasty but gave me the most horrible gas and bloating. Probably the flax in the crust. Pizza tasted good but I'll never go back.

name: Josh Martinez
text: The build your own pizza idea, while genius is beginning to be highly overdone. Pizza tasted fine and was fresh but toppings were somewhat skimpy as was cheese. Sauce was okay, but could have more flavor.  The salad was bland and dressing …More

name: Orion Stahlbaum
text: Ordered the BYO 7-topping online special last night. When I got the pizza home it had only 3 toppings and one of those was wrong. No bacon, no mushrooms, no artichokes, and green peppers instead of roasted red. Skimped on the cheese too - …More

name: Green Cleaner
text: Great concept and great price. Totally fills you up and the topping combinations are endless and they let you put it all on! Restaurant has always been clean

name: Suchithra Ramaswamy
text: Really loved the vegan pizza.. Can't wait to go back

name: Michelle Rodriguez
text: Great pizza, good variety of ingredients. This location is easy to get in and out of, close to our home, and it's simple to order online, prepay and then grab your stuff from a to go order pickup shelf.

name: Danny C
text: Friendly staff, great open atmosphere you can sit down inside or you can sit outside to enjoy the weather (weather permitting of course 👍)

name: Varun Kumar
text: I ordered a pizza and got the base and all toppings separately. I had to bake them again.  The staff was friendly though.

name: DJ BOLA
text: First timer. Interesting concept, it's like subway but for pizza. Food was great and no complaints.  Get a cookie and ask them to heat it up in the oven.  Comes out yummy!!

name: Gil Tao
text: I'm upgrading my review because I was here on 2/19 around 8 p.m. and I was so impressed by the kids  - yes kids - that work here... the young lady who took my order was super friendly and welcoming. The young lady who made my pizza was …More

name: Bret Williams
text: We really like the pizza. It’s fast, tasty and the regular crust has a nice brick oven crispness. Our disappointment is in the overall maintenance of the dining area (twice we’ve had to ask to have a table cleaned because all the empty …More

name: Jason Anderson
text: The best thing about Blaze is the Build Your Own pizza.    They have salads and some standard pizzas (although they make those when you order them just like BYO), but being able to build your pizza your way is awesome!   My wife doesn't …More

name: Jessica Lucas
text: Best pizza..... Ever! Try the blood orange lemonade. I dream about it it's so good.

name: mathlover146
text: Super delicious pizzas. Love getting to customize everything on the pizza. The drinks are also nice with an assortment of lemonades and iced teas. The resturant was pretty empty so there was no wait. Staff were helpful.

name: Ivan Baker
text: Love the service and actual taste of the pie when it comes to you. A great option if you want a cheap eat to sit down and something other than a burger.

name: Anthony Matthews
text: Easily one of the best pizza places I've been to! I love the "build your own" way of making my pizza because there's so much toppings to choose from! When I come I load my pizza up with all the meats. The price is definitely worth it and …More

name: Yaidelice Lopez
text: Awesome customer service. Love the pizza and dough knots. Tasty salads too.

name: Sai Siva
text: Delicious, Satisfying, and Well Worth: These are the three words to describe this wonderful fast food place. Their options for vegetarians and vegans keep growing, and watching the flames cook the pizza never gets boring!

name: Jason Ross
text: Always speedy service, family loves their pies!

name: Bill Campbell
text: Build your own pie and make it awesome! I did!

name: J N
text: Pretty good Pizza! Fast and build your own with a lot of choices ⚡️🤟👍

name: Thom Powers
text: Blaze is a pretty legit pie. Made to order and only takes a few minutes. Plus, every person that works there is super friendly and cool.

name: Christi Holmes
text: Keto pizza was gross and burnt. Can't believe they would serve this to customers. I will NEVER go back.

name: David Workman
text: Update: 04/25/19. Disappointed. Staff always changes (makes you wonder) and you never know what you are going to get. Beware of the 'rewards'. The email from Blaze said I got a free drink in 'honor of Earth Day'. In fact, the app used used …More

name: Lueds Far out
text: Great tasting pizza base, add what toppings you like. Love the Build Your Own concept. …More

name: Chi Vu
text: My family eats here about once a month or so. The service is fast, all the food is made to order, and the prices are reasonable. They often have specials about every month or so if you download the app or subscribe to their newsletter. You …More

name: Zamira Niyozova
text: Very bad place. Bad pizza. Bad customer service specialy name Josh. If I see this guy , I am not gonna spend money this place.

name: Alex Fender
text: Build your own for less than 10$!

name: Seth O'Connor
text: Great pizza at a good price. I'll be coming here more often.

name: Keli Moreno
text: Our 1st gluten free pizza! I was dreading it would be gross, but it was better than the regular crust to me! Maybe gluten free isn't as terrible as we thought it'd be. Thanks Blaze! 😁

name: Paul Scherf
text: Pretty good prices. The pizza is pretty good. Good for lunch. Service is friendly and fast. I think it got better over the last few months.

name: Brandon Zobisch
text: The low carb crust isn't very good... But everything else was pretty good. It's what would happen if Chipotle knocked up a Pizza Hut

name: Javier Silva
text: Always wonderful, Daniel was awesome and took care of my friend with Celiac's (Gluten Allergy) and personally handled his pizza professionally. Awesome work and taste~

name: sodaJ3RK
text: Great food with reasonable prices. Hands down my go to when I'm craving pizza

name: Harper Collins
text: Best pizza in town. Unlimited toppings and friendly staff; handmade deserts, dough knots, and salad too!

name: Josh Morgan
text: Sauce tastes sweet. Not as good as MOD pizza.

name: Freebird4303
text:
Chris was awesome
Helped me get the pizza I wanted with some extra cheese

name: FADI MARAWI
text: Best pizza in whole of AUSTIN. Love it . ❤️

name: Daveina De Los Santos
text: Love individual pizza! They also have vegan options, which is a good thing for my son.

name: Sonny Hong
text: Fresh to order and quick with keto options!

name: Alexa Dominguez
text: Blaze Pizza is just like Mod pizza. The layout is just like subway, you choose your own ingredients and they bake it for you. I think it's a good example of "healthy pizza" it's good. Don't be afraid to try new things.

name: Clay Berry
text: Attention to detail and ingredients were great.  Their half salad and half pizza option was nice and light.

name: AquaticWolfKuri
text: I loved it so much. I couldn't eat because I was vegan, but it was for my sister and she comes back here quite often now

name: Mary Wilkins
text: Delicious pizza. Fast, fresh ingredients, cooked in a real pizza oven at a reasonable price. I love the build your own option.

name: Sandra Olivares
text: I enjoyed my meal. I was very hungry and the wait was not long. Everything looked and tasted fresh. Prices were affordable. I would go again.

name: ANNE SHERMAN
text: Really good pizza

name: Marisol Ramos
text: Prefect for fast pizza, make your own

name: J.D. Matthias
text: A bit overpriced. The original dough is better than the rising crust, but overall nothing too spectacular

name: Hallie Duke
text:
I love their gluten free pizza... with pesto.
Go to meal on any day!

name: Deedledude asdf
text: Absolutely amazing. Think of it like Subway but for pizza. You get your pizza made and it is cooked for 3 minutes before coming out very hot. Also, it has house made lemonade. Truly a great place.

name: Monte Patterson
text: Used to eat here all the time. Bring back the original gluten free crust! The non-vegan, keto cauliflower are absolutely terrible. Going elsewhere until y'all bring it back.

name: Miles Ressler
text: Love the unlimited toppings and blood orange lemonade

name: Christy Mink
text: Great pizza! Fast and just the way I like it 😁

name: Elaine Hayes
text: Ever had a place mess up your pizza, I have- but these wonderful, friendly people will make it all over again no questions/ problems. Love going here- and there blood red orange drink is the best!

name: Sarah Acosta
text: This place is awesome. They don't charge you for every little topping. It tastes fresh and the prices are fair.

name: Dávid Vas
text: The keto cauliflower crust is amazing, the only such option around!

name: Adam Barton
text: Very cool atmosphere and their ingredients are great! Staff at this place made our date weekend real nice, I can tell they have some solid attention to detail, and are really maticulous about how they put together the pizzas. Was delicious!!!

name: Cathy Carpenter
text: Fantastic pizza !! Unique. Pricing reasonable. Custom pizza no limit on toppings $9 for personal pan size (only size available - a little bigger than most personal pans).

name: Bob Snyder
text: Good pizza. Much better than the other brick oven place in the Cedar Park area. Great staff and food. We'll be back for sure.

name: Nanette Popa
text: Delicious! Quick! Fresh ingredients.

name: Doc James
text: Quick delicious friendly and affordable

name: Norma Garza
text: Delicious pizza and fresh..lots of toppings to choose from. Fast and prompt.

name: Harish Kotra
text: Liquid base turns into a delicious pizza 🍕 within 10 minutes. Their red sauce on the base is crazy spicy and the pizzas tasted good too. …More

name: Nick Sarraf
text: Worth every dollar and consistent customer service day in and day out.

name: travis burstall
text: Good crust, the build your own isn't limited at all. I always get all the meats, black olives, pineapple, jalapenos, triple cheese, and spicy red sauce with a wing sauce drizzle. Never regretted eating here

name: Lucas Heartner
text: The environment is a bit loud for me and they could visit tables more often. Otherwise the food is great and they have excellent service!

name: Michael Walker
text: Great value. Build your own pizzas.

name: possumking
text: Very friendly staff and the pizza is super fast. The quailty is right up there as well. If your looking for a quick lunch or di nwr and dont want to do another drive through this place is faster and higher quality.

name: Mark Treyo
text:
(4.25☆'s)
This place is awesome; Just like a build your own burrito or waifu places. …More

name: Megan Shook
text: Did carry out for a family of 5, they accidentally slid all of the topping off of one of the pizzas and made us a new one! They are delicious! Blaze is basically an higher quality subway for pizza. 10/10 would recommend.

name: Matthew Dailey
text: It's the Chipotle of pizza. A fantastic idea. The pizza itself was a good size and had decent toppings. I'd go here again for sure.

name: 손한길
text: nice pizza with cool prize

name: Jeffrey Thompson
text: Awesome place with some really nice workers. Not a fan of arugula, but love that pesto sauce!

name: hbell1111
text: Love love love this place.  I buy 2 build your own loaded and freeze one.  1000xs better than Pappa Murphy's by FAR. KEEP UP GOOD WORK.

name: Derrick Williams
text: reminds me of Pieology, except i had a coupon for BOGO Free. would definitely go again, the crust was really good.

name: Kunal Vanjara
text: Diy pizza.. freshly made crust and super fat service.. whats not to love..

name: Van G
text: We really like this place. Pizza is really good. Service is fine. And we enjoy having dinner.

name: Kayla Hallback
text: I regret not coming here sooner. The food is delicious and there is no wait. I would also expect to pay more for the quality alone, but the price for a whole pizza is just $8 and thats with unlimited toppings. The staff is also really nice. …More

name: Andrew Capernaum
text: Got a free coupon from a friend to try it.  Went one evening and ordered simple pizza with arugula - fresh prepared, thin crust - great tasting.  I hope to go back!

name: Ricky Greer
text: Epic f'n pizza, the best

name: Luis Eduardo Varela
text: Fast and delicious.

name: Eduardo Garza
text: Good food kinda pricey...

name: JR Smith
text: Great place unless they forget your sauce drizzle and you.dont know until you get home and tryna eat.

name: Oscar Lopez
text: With a wide array of pizza toppings meats and cheeses blaze is the primary place to go for a premium customized personal Pizza at at friendly price especially if you like a lot of toppings. They are also vegan friendly which is a great example of the diversity in the possible selections.

name: Christopher Steele
text: This place is great. Service is always fast and lots of customization. I appreciate that they let you pile on the toppings without holding back or charging more. Their Agua Fresca is always great and a refreshing, unique drink you wouldn't expect to have at a random build your own pizza joint.

name: helena jones
text: The 1st time there and it was great. We ordered 1 pizza and then ordered another. Blaze pizza is make your own and I had mine my way.

name: Raddison F
text: The place was very spacious and I liked how they had their crust versus mods. Wish I had one near my house

name: iTheCamel
text: Great environment, great workers, and best of all, great pizza.

name: Angela Williams
text: I had  A bad experience in the pass and decided to give it a try again after a year.  So far it seems good and they cleaned up their act.  Last time the guy was coming his hair over the top of the food,  he is not here anymore and the pizza was good.

name: David Wilder
text: Fantastic pizza

name: Kent Trede
text: Good pizza. Only downside was crust seemed a little like store bought. Excellent sauceand toppings

name: Chrissy I
text: Made a chicken margarita version by starting with the Red Vine pizza. Thirsty Goat on tap also!

name: Roberto J. Ibarra
text: Great pizza at a great price! I have to say better tasting compared to MOD pizza.

name: Mace Martinez
text: Pizza was okay. Mods is much better.

name: Janelle Patterson
text: Very noisy. Hard to hear employees when they ask you a question. Food was okay, kinda pricey for what you get.

name: Jonathan Fritsch
text: Delicious, fast, and fairly priced. Always pleased with the service, and meal. Lemonade is ALWAYS my beverage of choice here. Noise from hard surfaces can be a bit too much with noisy families or kids, but have not had a bad experience yet. Show up for Pi (3/14) day for a cheap meal, but expect a line.

name: Eric Cano
text: Quality of fresh ingredients make all the difference. Fast fired delicious pizzas made to order. Not a bad item on the menu!

name: Taschet Rogers
text: This personal pizza place separates itself from Mods and Pieology by their incredible dough knots that only make it to my car. They are always freshly made. Also, their toppings are really flavorful and I luv the sausage. Only thing I wish …More

name: Timmy Broad
text: Food was great, staff were intentional and this Blaze location even delivers! What!? Consistent, quick bite with great quality food.

name: Lauren Garcia
text: Delicious toppings and crust. Love coming here to customize pizzas for the family. We all get what we want!

name: Billie Sanderson
text: The family loves Blaze. We get to get the toppings we want and several choices of sauce and cheese to really customize it to your taste.

name: DeeDee Ringer
text: Ordered veggie pizza with vegan cheese and it was out of this world, so delicious. Ordering was a bit confusing but we got it done. I totally recommend this place.

name: Michael Toohey
text: Very reasonable price and excellent food. Very glad my friend showed this place to me. I built my own pizza and used their spicy red sauce. Definitely good enough to be in the mix of regular places i eat. Excellent customer service to top it all off. Wonderful experience.

name: Stephen Middleton
text:
Great pizza that you build yourself. Pile on as much as you want for one price.

Staff attitude and restrooms loose a star.

name: Angela Bell
text: Concept of pizza made on demand and watching a person make is great...however this place center loads toppings and don't use enough cheese. Red sauce is so so. They are  definitely better then Cici's pizza.

name: Marius Morosanu
text: It’s nearly impossible to beat blaze. High end product for $9. Fresh everything real mozzarella. Great people and top end management. TJ is a stellar guy.

name: Ray Frost
text: We love Blaze Pizza.

name: Akhad Yakhyaev
text:
Name Josh needs more training.

customer service is bad.

name: Sasha Harrison
text: Yummy meat lovers pizza!

name: J B
text: Great helpful staff, large affordable portions, fresh ingredients, great price, and it tastes amazing!

name: Ryan Egger
text: We love Blaze! The build-your-own is my favorite. If Ean is working, have him make your pizza. That guy is fantastic and knows how to build a great pizza! Pro-tip: Try the blood orange lemonade and you can thank me later.

name: Mac
text: Pizza tasted great it was very cleanly and nice staff will definitely go back when I get a chance to again

name: Timothy Williams
text: You can create your own pizza or go with some signature ones they already have. Lots of options and toppings to add. I didn't care for it very much, but my wife enjoys it.

name: Creamy Dulrain
text: One of the best pizza stores I've ever been to 💯💯💯

name: Penny Lauritzen
text: Very similar to MOD. Better crust, slightly less ingredients than MOD. The pizza I got was very good. All the kids liked it. It was echoey in there.

name: Joshua Johnson
text: Incredible pizza experience... All around amazing.

name: Fishin 4 Bogey
text: Build your own pizza is the way to go.  Lots of different ingredients to choose from. Been to the Davie, Florida location a bunch of times. This is just as good!

name: Joseph Simon
text: Great vegan pizza here!

name: T x
text: Fast service, good pizza, good price. What's not to like?

name: Nick
text: First of all Zack needs a call out.  Amazing customer service; friendly, helpful, you can tell he actually cares about the customers, that's something you rarely see at a pizza joint.  Secondly the pizza was amazing, new favorite spot to …More

name: Jacob Morales

text: Subway for pizza but definitely tastes 10 times better. They have signature options but build your own is the way to go. For $8 you build your own 14 inch pizza from the sauce to the toppings. Both the bf and I can have a pizza and a drink for under $25 and we both take half our pizza home. Can I marry a pizza joint???

text: Good pizza, better than the similar place up the road. Quick, great service, and tons of topping choices. Crust is thin and crispy, but has a decently thick edge, unlike the other place. Love the spicy red sauce and goat cheese options. Nice selection of local beers on draft.

text: So I probably come to this place at least twice a month. Each time I come I get something new. There is so many options you'll find something for even the toughest person to please. But I will say the size is not a regular large but with all the options it makes up for it and it's cheap.

name: Joseph Williams
text: What fun about Blaze Pizza is you get to watch the cooks assemble the meal.  Pick the crust, sauce, and toppings you want.  The size of the whole pizza is small, so the right size for a meal for one.  The cooks place your pizza in a brick oven where it cooks very fast.  The beverages run from soda, lemonade, to beer.
